DOC.brief_summary: This observational , noninterventional study design characterize effectiveness safety profile vismodegib ( Erivedge ) Argentine patient . Only patient locally advance basal cell carcinoma ( laBCC ) metastatic basal cell carcinoma ( mBCC ) consider effectiveness analysis . Study duration estimate approximately 12 month .
